title: Samba快速入门
content:
安装Samba

[root@localhost ~]# yum install samba -y
[root@localhost ~]# cd /etc/samba/
[root@localhost samba]# ls
lmhosts  smb.conf  smb.conf.example
[root@localhost samba]# mv smb.conf smb.conf.bak
[root@localhost samba]# grep -v "#" smb.conf.bak > smb.conf

配置文件smb.conf

[root@localhost samba]# vim smb.conf

[global]
        workgroup = SAMBA
        security = user 

        passdb backend = tdbsam

        printing = cups
        printcap name = cups
        load printers = yes
        cups options = raw
[myshare]
                ##共享文件目录路径
                path=/opt/wbm         
                browseable=yes
                create mask=0644
                directory mask=0755
                ##允许访问的用户
                valid users=wbm
                ##允许写入的用户
                write list=wbm

创建用户

[root@localhost samba]#useradd wbm

给用户设置密码

[root@localhost samba]#smbpasswd -a wbm

列出smb用户列表

[root@localhost samba]#pdbedit -L  
wbm:1000:

创建Samba共享目录

[root@localhost ~]#mkdir /opt/wbm
[root@localhost ~]#chmod 777 /opt/wbm
[root@localhost ~]#systemctl start smb.service

挂在samba共享

[root@vm22 ~]# mount -t cifs //192.168.10.21/wbm /opt/wbm/ -o username=wbm,password=qwer1.2.3.
[root@vm22 ~]# cd /opt/wbm/
[root@vm22 wbm]# ls
Install_nginx.sh

开机自动挂载

[root@vm22 wbm]# vim /etc/fstab

#在末尾处添加

//192.168.10.21 /opt/wbm    cifs username=wbm,password=qwer1.2.3. 0 0
